metadata.title: CVE-2022-2095 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An improper access control check in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 13.7 before 15.0.5, all versions starting from 15.1 before15.1.4, all versions starting from 15.2 before 15.2.1 allows a maliciousauthenticated user to view a public project's Deploy Key's publicfingerprint and name when that key has write permission. Note that GitLabnever asks for nor stores the private key.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
